name: Paddle Palooza
description:
This is an arcade game where you have to play pinball and breakout at the same time! Be warned, all paddles move at once with the press of a key!

It's Paddle-monium!

Controls:

Arrow Keys -Paddles / Flippers

Backspace / Escape - Pause

Credits:

Game - HavokRocket

Font - Heaven Castro

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theme: "Joined Together"
